info.name: LeagueLeaders.API
info.description:
# LeagueLeaders API Postman Collection

This repository contains the Postman collection for the LeagueLeaders API. The collection can be imported into Postman for development and testing purposes.

## Importing the Collection

1. Download the `LeagueLeadersAPI.PostmanCollection.json` file from the `.artifacts` directory.
2. Open Postman and click on "Import".
3. Select the downloaded `.json` file and import it into Postman.
4. The collection will be available in your Postman under the name "LeagueLeaders.API".

## API Documentation

For details about each endpoint, please refer to the API documentation or explore the collection in Postman.

response.name: Success
